statements: DELETE FROM community_demographics WHERE country = 'USA' AND population < 10000;
DELETE FROM community_demographics WHERE country = 'USA' AND population > 1000000;
DELETE FROM community_demographics WHERE community_id = 100 AND pollution_level > 0.5;

DELETE FROM campaign_participants WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
